title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 853/91 of 5 April 1991 on duties applicable in the Community as constituted on 31 December 1985 to ' wild onions' of the species Muscari comusum from Spain and Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 853/91  of 5 April 1991  on duties applicable in the Community as constituted on 31 December 1985 to 'wild onions' of the species Muscari comusum from Spain and Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The customs duty applicable in the Community as constituted on 31 December 1985 to 'wild onions' of the species Muscari comusum falling within CN code ex 0709 90 90 from Spain and Portugal meeting the conditions laid down in Article 9 (2) of  the Treaty is hereby reduced to 4,8 % during the following periods:
- on import from Spain: from 1 January 1988 to 31 December 1992,
- on import from Portugal: from 1 January 1988 to 31 December 1991.  Article 2
This Regulation shall enter into force on the 15th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1988. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 April 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 395, 31. 12. 1987, p. 1.
